# API Reference

## Auto-Generated Documentation
This project uses automated tools to generate API documentation from source code comments.

### Generation
To generate the documentation locally:

```bash
# Language specific command (e.g. 'make docs' or 'pdoc src')
make docs
```

### Hosting
The latest documentation is hosted at:
[https://docs.talosprotocol.com](https://docs.talosprotocol.com) (Placeholder)

## Core Classes
- **Agent**: The main entry point for the SDK.
- **Crypto**: Cryptographic primitives (Ed25519, X25519).
- **Transport**: MCP transport layer.

Refer to the source code docstrings for the most up-to-date information.
